channel.title: CVE Feed for Realtek -- GPON router
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Realtek -- GPON router

item.title: CVE-2022-40740|2024-08-03T12:28:41.521Z -- realtek -- gpon%20router
item.description: Realtek GPON router has insufficient filtering for special characters. A remote attacker authenticated as an administrator can exploit this vulnerability to perform command injection attacks, to execute arbitrary system command, manipulate system or disrupt service.
